alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Jackson; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 1:20AM MST until December 09 at 3:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Ziebach County, the Pennington County Plains, Haakon County, Northern Jackson County and the Southern Meade County Plains. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Jackson; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach
